trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol has a passion for rations.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid scorpions at the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid scorpions to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid wild berries at the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid wild berries to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid piranha in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid piranha to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Once we descend into the caverns, you'll appreciate that it isn't always practical to return to the surface to satisfy every bodily whim.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>In light of this, I provide our workers with some rations to take with them, and I'd be grateful if you could assist me by obtaining an ingredient.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Scorpions are what I require─three ought to do nicely. You will find them if you search in the Husk.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>Wild berries are what I require─three handfuls ought to do nicely. You will find them growing in the Husk.

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>A piranha is what I require─just one ought to do nicely. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta, but you'll need to be handy with a spear.

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_040<tab>As they say, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, one can't work on an empty stomach─much less when one isn't down in the caverns. So please, bring me the ingredient.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>That's three scorpions I require, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You will find them if you search in the Husk.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>That's three handfuls of wild berries I require, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You will find them growing in the Husk.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>That's a piranha I require, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Did your procurement efforts meet with success?

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Oho, such lively scorpions these are! And this one almost stung me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be stinging anyone after I've fried it up to a crisp, oh no.

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Oho, such plump, juicy berries these are! I shall press them to make invigorating drinks for our workers in the event they can't readily find groundwater.

TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Oho, such a lively piranha this is! And it almost took a bite out of me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be biting anyone after I've cleaned out its guts and hung it up to dry, oh no.
TEXT_BANQIQ106_03811_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>With that, I shall set about the preparations at once. My thanks for your kind assistance, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
